<ref name=altriaeight/> It has testified on behalf of IQOS before the the Food and Drug Administration  (FDA)and argued that tobacco taxes cause crime.<ref>R.Bate, [https://www.aei.org/publication/pakistans-tobacco-tax-folly/ Pakistan’s tobacco folly], website, 21 June 2018, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name=pra>[https://www.propertyrightsalliance.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/2018-Global-Plain-Packaging-Coalition-to-WHO.pdf Open Letter]  "Property Rights Alliance", 2018, accessed July 2019<</ref>

<ref name=altriaeight/><ref name=guardian/> In 2015, then President John A Charles Jr testified before the state Senate that tobacco users had paid “more than their fair share” and did not deserve more taxes.<ref>State Leigislature, [https://olis.leg.state.or.us/liz/2015R1/Downloads/CommitteeMeetingDocument/52548 Testimony], website, 11 March 2015, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name = guardian/> and regularly campaigns against tobacco taxes and testified in favour of IQOS.<ref>FDA Hearing, [https://web.archive.org/web/20180821214811/https:/www.fda.gov/downloads/AdvisoryCommittees/CommitteesMeetingMaterials/TobaccoProductsScientificAdvisoryCommittee/UCM599235.pdf Transcript], p398, 25 January 2018, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name=IJHPM>J.Smith, S.Thompson and K.Lee, [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5716244/ The Atlas Network: a “strategic ally” of the tobacco industry], ‘’International Journal of Health Planning and Management, 28 April 2016, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name=testimony>FDA Testimony, [https://web.archive.org/web/20180821214811/https:/www.fda.gov/downloads/AdvisoryCommittees/CommitteesMeetingMaterials/TobaccoProductsScientificAdvisoryCommittee/UCM599235.pdf Transcript], 25 January 2018, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name=guardian/> and testified in favour of IQOS<ref name=testimony/>. Sal Nuzzo, vice president of policy at the Institute, has argued that regulations on e-cigarettes should be relaxed.<ref>S.Nuzzo and G.Bentley, [https://web.archive.org/web/20190722142148/https://www.jamesmadison.org/e-cigarettes-not-in-the-same-category-as-cigarettes/ E-cigarettes not in the same category as cigarettes],  "Sun Sentinel", 22 March 2019, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name = guardian/> The center’s president, Andrew Cline, has argued that New Hampshire should not tax e-cigarettes as it does tobacco.<ref>A.Cline, [https://web.archive.org/web/20190722143044/https://jbartlett.org/2019/07/expanding-the-tobacco-tax-to-non-tobacco-products-is-bad-policy/ Expanding the tobacco tax to non-tobacco products is bad policy], website, 17 July 2019, accessed July 2019</ref>

<ref name=testimony/> and was considered a key ally of [[Philip Morris International]].<ref>Philip Morris, [https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/tobacco/docs/#id=zmmy0071 National Allies], "Tobacco Industry Documents", February 2000, accessed July 2019</ref>
